div.p: Welcome to a Prototype Digital Edition by Records of Early English Drama (REED).

The Fortune Theatre Records: A Prototype Digital Edition is an important first stage of development for the future publication of born-digital editions in the Records of Early English Drama series. This initiative grew out of a collaboration between the Records of Early English Drama (REED) and the University of Toronto Libraries at the University of Toronto, the Department of Digital Humanities (DDH) at King's College London, the Centre for Digital Humanities at Ryerson University, and REEDâ€™s academic publisher, Boydell & Brewer. We are very grateful to the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation for a grant to fund this initiative (for further details, please see Team and Sponsor).
